title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Go CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Phi, etc. locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client for the Ollama server; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client; sync & async APIs, chat, generate, pull, list, embeddings.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama; use any local GGUF model as an LLM or chat endpoint.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; markdown, code highlight, model manager, RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; supports generate, chat, pull, list, embeddings, custom options.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list, embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust CLI wrapper for Ollama with REPL, conversation history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s UI.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for running Ollama on Raspberry Pi, Kubernetes, AWS Lambda, etc.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module exposing Ollama endpoints with Swagger docs and DTOs.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain in 50 lines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Unofficial Dart/Flutter package for Ollama; chat, generate, stream, embeddings.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration for Ollama; injectable OllamaTemplate bean.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight Rust crate for Ollama REST API with async/await and serde types.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama; supports .NET 6+ and Unity.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated registry of GGUF models optimized for Ollama with Modelfile snippets.
